IntroConv1.speaker: Controller
IntroConv1.text: Surface party be advised, you are now entering the AO. Clock is running. No unexpected signatures or indications of sapient hostiles so far, but there might be movement at the dig site - watch for scientists and, or wildlife. Shouldnâ€™t be too hard to tell which is which.

IntroConv2.speaker: Hero
IntroConv2.text: Copy that. Any info on what they were looking for?

IntroConv3.speaker: Controller
IntroConv3.text: Negative, Surface. There's the ruins, but we don't know what's inside. That being said, archaeologists don't normally go missing like this, so watch your back. And, for that matter, all your other directions too.

WildlifeContact1.speaker: Hero
WildlifeContact1.text: Hostile contact. Looks like local wildlife.

WildlifeContact2.speaker: Controller
WildlifeContact2.text: Understood. Recommend shooting anything that tries to eat your face.

WeaponFiredBeforeContact.speaker: Controller
WeaponFiredBeforeContact.text: Good to know your weapons still work.

WeaponFiredBeforeContactIntoGround.speaker: Controller
WeaponFiredBeforeContactIntoGround.text: Yup, that sand looks pretty dead to me.

HeroTriesToLeaveArea.speaker: Controller
HeroTriesToLeaveArea.text: You're going the wrong way. Turn around.

HeroTriesToLeaveAreaAgain.speaker: Controller
HeroTriesToLeaveAreaAgain.text: Remember, you're looking for the big gray thing with a glowing beam sticking out of it.

HeroTriesToLeaveAreaYetAgain.speaker: Controller
HeroTriesToLeaveAreaYetAgain.text: I have no idea what you're trying to accomplish. The ruins are the only interesting thing on this planet.

WildlifeDead.speaker: Controller
WildlifeDead.text: Okay, that seems to be all of them. See if you can get inside now.

DoorFlamethrowerRecommendation1.speaker: Hero
DoorFlamethrowerRecommendation1.text: I won't get through that easily.

DoorFlamethrowerRecommendation2.speaker: Controller
DoorFlamethrowerRecommendation2.text: What the hell is that stuff? It looks weirdly organic... I recommend setting it on fire. There should be a flamethrower back in the shuttle.

DoorFlamethrowerRecommendation3.speaker: Hero
DoorFlamethrowerRecommendation3.text: Copy. It should be useful underground too.

FlamethrowerFiredNoTarget.speaker: Hero
FlamethrowerFiredNoTarget.text: Weapon system nominal. Head on back to the Ruins now.

FlamethrowerFiredAtDoor2.speaker: Controller
FlamethrowerFiredAtDoor2.text: Sure looks like it. There should be some more fuel nearby - you might want to refuel before heading inside.

EnteringRuins2.speaker: Controller
EnteringRuins2.text: Copy that. Keep in touch and make sure to report anything unusual.

RuinsCommsLoss1.speaker: Controller
RuinsCommsLoss1.text: Positioning's bugging out. Something's interfering with the comms.

RuinsCommsLoss2.speaker: Hero
RuinsCommsLoss2.text: Voice is going down too. I'm probably getting shielded by the rocks.

RuinsFirstEnemyDead1.speaker: Controller
RuinsFirstEnemyDead1.text: Sorry, I'm back. Did I miss anything?

RuinsFirstEnemyDead2.speaker: Hero
RuinsFirstEnemyDead2.text: Yeah, something attacked me. Looked a lot like what was blocking the doorway up on the surface.

RuinsFirstEnemyDead3.speaker: Controller
RuinsFirstEnemyDead3.text: Hm, copy that. Proceed further with caution.

RuinsTravellingFleshTutorial1.speaker: Controller
RuinsTravellingFleshTutorial1.text: That blob that came out of the creature when it died seemed to help the other.

RuinsTravellingFleshTutorial3.speaker: Controller
RuinsTravellingFleshTutorial3.text: That's your solution to everything, isn't it?

RuinsTravellingFleshTutorial4.speaker: Hero
RuinsTravellingFleshTutorial4.text: It's been a winning formula so far so...

HubStareAtUpperDoor.speaker: Controller
HubStareAtUpperDoor.text: No way you're getting up there right now. Try looking around, see if you can find something useful.

HubStareAtArmoredDoor.speaker: Controller
HubStareAtArmoredDoor.text: That looks too thick for your rifle. On the bright side, archaeologists often carry laser cutters, so there might be one in these ruins somewhere.

HubStareAtBossDoor1.speaker: Controller
HubStareAtBossDoor1.text: That door isn't opening the same as the others...

HubStareAtBossDoor2.speaker: Hero
HubStareAtBossDoor2.text: It has to open somehow. I'll look around.

PickUpJetpack2.speaker: Controller
PickUpJetpack2.text: Just watch your head with that thing in here.

StareAtUpperDoorWithJetpack.speaker: Controller
StareAtUpperDoorWithJetpack.text: Might wanna check out whatever's up there.

SwarmerEncounter.speaker: Controller
SwarmerEncounter.text: Watch out, those small ones are quick.

PickUpLaserCutter1.speaker: Controller
PickUpLaserCutter1.text: Looks like a laser cutter module - they're good for getting through armor.

PickUpLaserCutter2.speaker: Hero
PickUpLaserCutter2.text: Or barricades. Let's head back to the hub.

ReturnToArmoredDoor.speaker: Hero
ReturnToArmoredDoor.text: That's definetely covering something. This cutter should help getting through.

PickUpGrenadeLauncher2.speaker: Controller
PickUpGrenadeLauncher2.text: Sure seems like it. Why would the archaeologists need that?

PickUpGrenadeLauncher3.speaker: Controller
PickUpGrenadeLauncher3.text: Anyway, that door in the hub seemed to open. I'd recommend checking out wherever it leads to next.

OverrideConsole.speaker: Controller
OverrideConsole.text: This should help you get through that door. Just hit the switch.

SeeBoss2.speaker: Controller
SeeBoss2.text: It's probably friendly. You should step closer to it.

BossSpinUp1.speaker: Controller
BossSpinUp1.text: So killing you is easier, of course.

BossSpinUp4.speaker: Boss
BossSpinUp4.text: You'll meet the same fate as those who came before. Join them in my flesh.

BossExplanationArmor.speaker: Hero
BossExplanationArmor.text: Those plates look like I can burn through them.

BossEndControllerBack1.speaker: Controller
BossEndControllerBack1.text: Finally! Comms are back online... Only took {gameDuration} for tech to get their crap together... Wait, what the hell's all that? When did you get that deep?

BossEndControllerBack2.speaker: Hero
BossEndControllerBack2.text: It's a long story... I'll fill you in at the debrief.

BossEndControllerBack3.speaker: Controller
BossEndControllerBack3.text: Debrief? What about the archeologists we came here to save?

BossEndControllerBack4.speaker: Hero
BossEndControllerBack4.text: There's nothing we can do for them anymore.

BossEndControllerBack5.speaker: Controller
BossEndControllerBack5.text: Damn, so we were too slow then? Copy, head back to the ship. We'll discuss it once you're clear of threats.
